sect1.title: Foreword
sect1.para: Being a Systems Engineer by trade and having used Linux From Scratch (LFS) for about a year, I was looking for a way to automate tasks on my Linux servers at work. One day, while surfing the LFS website, I found the ALFS project and then the nALFS implementation. After trying it out, I fell in love with the tool. I have been able to completely automate server builds, software package installation and administrative tasks across my data center. Since I like the product so much, I wanted to give back to the project and decided to take on the task of documentation. I hope you like the product as much as I do and it provides the same utility to your environment as it has mine.
